body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/oX3dxcXIhM708ZW78UzV6CuLDBeSIaPLTrGMJEvkeBhM0pHtA1Jt*KECIm48JbbYO59JfK0MwGgTCNFwv68JqGl2ZzviSE2h/problemground.jpg) Hi, I tried to do a sunlight hour analysis on the form but I would like to know how many hours will it hit the ground as well, how come the ground just read as blue?
topic: Ladybug not analysing the ground surface

replies.body:
Dian,

Just flip the normal of the ground surface.

-A.
